text: BreakTudo Awards 2018 also called BTDAs 2018 were held on October 21, 2018, in São Paulo, in Brazil. It aired live on Virou Festa on YouTube and was hosted by Tiago Fabri e Alexandre Duarte. Anitta and Cardi B led the list of nominations with five mentions each. Anitta, BTS and Camila Cabello were the big winners, with four awards each. == Winners and nominees == Nominees were announced on August 25, 2018 through a post on the official website. The voting started on September 1 and closed on October 15. The singer Anitta leads the list of nominations with 5 nominations, one of them is for the category Best Fandom. In the vice-leadership in the list of nominees, appear Demi Lovato, Camila Cabello, BTS, Cardi B and Taylor Swift. The winners were announced on October 21, 2018. ===Female Brazilian Artist=== * Anitta *Claudia Leitte *Ivete Sangalo *Iza *Joelma *Ludmilla ===Male Brazilian Artist=== *Alok * Luan Santana *Lucas
